project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and user interactions will occur through the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a contact
Implement functionality to search for a contact
Implement functionality to update a contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they work correctly
